**2022-03-30 / @rsc, @ianlancetaylor, @griesemer, @bradfitz**

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **net: make errCanceled and errTimeout be "errors.Is" context.Canceled and context.DeadlineExceeded** [#51428](https://golang.org/issue/51428)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
